variant.title: 23rd Annual Meeting of the Association for Computational Linguistics Proceedings of the Conference
variant.author: 8-12 July 1985
variant.affiliation: University of Chicago Chicago, Illinois, USA
variant.note: Published by the Association for Computational Linguistics © 1985, Association for. Computational Linguistics Order copies of this and other ACL proceedings from: Donald E. Walker (ACL) Bell Communications Research 445 South Street MIRE 2A379 Morristown, NJ 07960, USA PREFACE
variant.bodyText: The conference program and organization have been created through the efforts of a large number of people who have given generously of their time and talents. I especially thank the program committee:
variant.figure: A p plications Panel: rim Finin Ralph Grishman Beatrice Oshika Gary Simons Jonathan Slocum Theory Panel: Robert Amsler Rusty Bobrow Daniel Chester Phil Cohen Ivan Sag
variant.affiliation: University of Pennsylvania New York University System Development Corporation Summer Institute of Linguistics Microelectronics and Computer Technology Corporation Bell Communications Research Bolt Beranek and Newman University of Delaware
variant.bodyText: Other energetic contributors include Martha Evens and Victor Yngve, who have made it possible to meet at the University of Chicago; Carole Hafner, who has put to- gether a marvelous collection of exhibits and demonstrations; Lisa Trentham, who has facilitated the necessvry communication in a hundred ways; and Norm Sondheimer and Don Walker. whose experience and energy have kept the whole process on course. Now we can all benefit from their generosity.
